Text.Page:
For eons, the faeries of Seeliewood never worried about dangers dropping in from aboveâ€”up until the day emberheart dracoloths broke through their protective shield. Now the fey are constantly battling illness, argons, and all the other threats to their sacred land.

I don't care why the dracoloths decided to land here. I'm more concerned about how they got through.

I have a theory: there must be something special about the hides of the dracoloths. Would you bring me some to examine?

Thank you for these.

This emberhide could teach me a lot about how the dracoloths circumvented the magic barriers. Or I just might get a fancy new suit out of it.

Thank you in either case.

The dracoloths broke through a protective shield that Isren and the fey set up.

That's worth investigating.
